CHAT.comment: DONALD L. CARCIERI, GOVERNOR OF RHODE ISLAND, ET AL., Petitioners v. DIRK KEMPTHORNE, SECRETARY OF THE INTERIOR, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:00 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DEANNE E. MAYNARD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 2:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
